translations: 再捕获；夺回；收回（丢失的东西）；再体验（recapture 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Well, recapturing part of the market, or even expand market is entirely possible.
sentences.translation: 那么，夺回一部分市场，甚至扩大市场是完全可能的。

sentences.sentence: Recapturing the past is a tricky business. While most memoriesare simply souvenirs of a happier time, others can be quitedeadly.
sentences.translation: 回顾过去不是件容易事，其中大部分是关于快乐时光的记忆，也有的可能是致命的。

sentences.sentence: Recapturing the past is a tricky business. While most memories are simply souvenirs of a happier time, others can be quite deadly.
sentences.translation: 回顾过去不是件容易事，其中大部分是关于快乐时光的记忆，也有的可能是致命的。
